content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1611567226473{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep new-page-section1″][vc_column el_class=”new-row1-column”]

[vc_column_text]

Engaging membership websites

Create an exclusive online community you can share with the world

Establish your authority, grow your personal brand and business, and enjoy building a tight-knit community with people from anywhere in the world who want to connect with you!

Membership platforms or plugins including AccessAlly can also integrate with other marketing systems (such as your email marketing) to streamline communications and help you target your messages so they reach the right people.

Popular types of membership sites include:[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

  • Continual access to new (and old) content
  • Flat-fee access to all content and other resources
  • Free trial period with limited access to resources
  • Online course membership site
  • Fixed-term subscription (e.g. 30 days)

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1611807076919{background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}” el_class=”lp-main-section”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611548955718{padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/bg-member.jpg?id=14928) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”forceBgRight”][vc_empty_space height=”460px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611739733357{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”normPadColMobile right-col-padding”][vc_column_text]

How to create a membership website

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]From basic free membership portals to customised solutions for niche markets, Confetti Design has the experience and expertise and knowledge to create a membership site that offers all the functionality you need.

We have great trust and confidence in the WordPress plugin AccessAlly.

This all-in-one tool is almost too good to be true, full of sensational features and capabilities to bring your membership site to life![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1611549124128{margin-top: 30px !important;}”]

AccessAlly features

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

  • Accepts one-off and recurring payments
  • Free memberships
  • Paid membership tiers
  • Points and gamification to track user progress

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

  • Email marketing integration
  • Reporting dashboards
  • And much more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_column_text]

  • Accepts one-off and recurring payments
  • Free memberships
  • Paid membership tiers
  • Points and gamification to track user progress
  • Email marketing integration
  • Reporting dashboards
  • And much more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]An AccessAlly website is loaded with tons of features – if you’d like to know more, please get in touch.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” el_class=”new-benefits-section”][vc_column el_class=”normPadColMobile” css=”.vc_custom_1611550325282{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1611550096465{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

Benefits of membership sites

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1611550256841{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Increase your revenue

Your membership site can become an ongoing stream of revenue, helping you to invest further in other parts of your business.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1611550252317{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Build a loyal community

Your voice – amplified. Along with building trust and loyalty, you’ll build an engaged and active online community who can’t get enough of you and your offerings.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

Expand to new markets

Distance is no longer an issue, and with no need for a physical product, your digital membership can reach anyone in the world![/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
